Plot result of PCA

Source: R/DESeq2.R
plotPCA.Rd

This function is internally called by runDESeq2

plotPCA(rld, pheno_info, out_dir, prefix = "DESeq2")

Arguments

rld

Count table after 'regularized log transformation' by rlog
pheno_info

A data frame with sample identifiers as row names including maximal two columns defining (sub-)conditions. The sample identifiers must be identical to those in the rld table.
out_dir

Directory for PDF file including the PCA plot
prefix

Prefix for name of PDF file

Value

DESeq2_PCA.pdf in output directory

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
